mapper.sql: id, type_name, type_code, ranking, description, state_enum, delete_enum, create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, delete_date, delete_user_id
mapper.select:
select
from sys_param_type where state_enum = #{stateEnum} order by ranking asc

select
from sys_param_type where delete_enum = #{deleteEnum} order by ranking asc

select
from sys_param_type where delete_enum = #{deleteEnum} and state_enum = #{stateEnum} order by ranking asc
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_param_type(
id, type_name, type_code, ranking, description, state_enum, delete_enum, create_date, create_user_id, update_date, update_user_id, delete_date, delete_user_id )VALUES
(
#{item.id}, #{item.typeName}, #{item.typeCode}, #{item.ranking}, #{item.description}, #{item.stateEnum}, #{item.deleteEnum}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.updateUserId}, #{item.deleteDate}, #{item.deleteUserId} )
